title: unfair perma ban
body: I just had a few real bad games with a few real ban people that harrassed me the entire game but riot decided to ban me for defending myself? how is that just in any way shape or form? is there something that can be done to unban someone because thats complete bs

replies.body: Most likely that ban wasn't placed without several warnings and suspensions happening first unless what was said was so extreme it made you skip penalties. If you need more context on why the ban was placed though, you're more than welcome to hit up our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

You had multiple warnings before this ban most likely. If you'd like to discuss it, you'll need to post your chat logs as well as your prior punishment history. You'll also be more likely to get a response to this on the Player Behavior boards.
